attributes.action: Deport all legal and illegal migrants who commit sexual abuse and murder
attributes.additional_details: To make the country safer for all citizens and to reduce costs of housing in prison.
attributes.background: All legal and illegal migrants who commit crimes against British citizens irregardless of colour or religion or sexual orientation should be deported.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705093
